title: Implement base UI component library with design system
description: Build the foundational UI component library following the design system specification. These components will be reused across all pages. Focus on polish: proper states, transitions, and visual feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Button component with 5 variants (primary, secondary, ghost, danger, success)
Button states: default, hover (lift effect), active (press), focus (ring), disabled, loading
Input component with states: default, hover, focus (glow ring), error, disabled
Card component with interactive variant (hover lift) and static variant
Badge component with color variants matching status colors
Table component with striped rows, hover highlight, expandable row animation
Dialog/Modal with focus trap, backdrop, slide-in animation
Skeleton components for text, card, table-row
Toast component with slide-in animation and auto-dismiss progress bar
CSS custom properties for design tokens (colors, shadows, radii, durations)
All transitions use consistent timing (75ms-300ms per spec)
Focus rings visible and consistent (2px primary-500 with offset)
implementation_notes: Use Tailwind's @apply or extend config for design tokens
Consider using Radix UI primitives for complex components (Dialog, Select)
Test all states visually before marking complete
Ensure components work standalone - no page context required
Add Storybook or similar for component documentation (optional)
